attributes.action: Stop closure/lowering hours of accident and emergency units in sussex
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In Sussex many A&E units are being closed and the ones that are not being closed are being turned into 9-5 opening only.....any non-serious (life threatening) cases are being taken for example from Brighton to Croyden or Haywards Heath which are at least a 40mins drive away....

This is unacceptable as this would mean that many peoples lifes would be in danger.....
